mapper.select: select b.bno, title, bcontent, bwriter, regDate, visit, up, category_cd, cnt from board b left join (select bno, count(bno) cnt from comm group by bno) c on b.bno = c.bno order by regDate desc

select * from ( select row_number() over (order by regDate desc) ronum, b.bno, title, bcontent, bwriter, regDate, visit, up, category_cd, cnt from board b left join (select bno, count(bno) cnt from comm group by bno) c on b.bno = c.bno
) where ronum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} and category_cd = #{category} order by regDate desc;
select count(*) from board where category_cd=#{category}

select b.bno, title, bcontent, bwriter, regDate, visit, up, cnt from board b left join (select bno, count(bno) cnt from comm group by bno) c on b.bno = c.bno where b.bno = #{bno} order by regDate desc
select category_cd from users join category on users.major = category.category_nm where users.email=#{email}
mapper.update: update board set visit=visit+1 where bno=#{bno}
update board set up=up+1 where bno=#{bno}
update board set up=up-1 where bno=#{bno}
